channel.title: I got some bug/spyware/trojan :(
channel.description:
[img]http://www.filecram.com/files/uhoh.PNG[/img] http://www.filecram.com/files/uhoh.PNG
How do I fix? I tried Ad Aware, currently scanning with non admin priv avast free scan.

item.title: I got some bug/spyware/trojan :(
item.dc:creator: @boblonian boblonian
item.description:
@boblonian wrote:

Id recommend AVG Free edition or Ad ware. If it doesn’t work maybe the file is just corrupted and you might need to delete it?

Read full topic

item.title: I got some bug/spyware/trojan :(
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Just a guess, but I assume that’s trying to advertise a program to remove computer stuff.

Like Schizzo said, try Spybot S&D and AVG, Adaware and possibly CCleaner, and uninstall any other computer fixing software(apart from possibly TuneUp Utilities) that you may have, unless your SURE you know it’s safe. All to often will programs say they can help fix your pc only to track important data. (Not necessarily harmful, maybe just collecting info on how you use your computer without consent.)

Read full topic

item.title: I got some bug/spyware/trojan :(
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

You should also try AVG Free Antivirus and Spybot - Search & Destroy. Just search for them on Google, they could definitely help.

Read full topic
